name: Protect The Burrow
description:
Protect The Burrow

You are a rabbit who has to protect their burrow from the evil Raccoons and Birds.

Your chosen form of defense is: cabbage.

Controls:

Arrow Keys/Wasd - move rabbit.

Spacebar - in and out of holes.

(when sticking out of hole) Mouse - aim

                                                            Primary mouse button (most likely left click) - launch cabbage

You win when the timer at the top left gets to 0.

You lose if your health at the top right gets to 0.

Notes:

You have to move before going into a hole. this is a bug.

Play in fullscreen to see the whole thing.

Not mobile friendly.

I will be releasing a Devlog on my youtube channel soon!

Credits + Methods:

Art - Made by me in Inkscape

Game - Made by me in Unity

Music - Made by Vibrato-tunes (the name I use for uploading music on soundcloud

SFX - Made by me in bfxr.net
